description: Discover the best hotels in Cambridge, United Kingdom. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Countryside Spa Sanctuary Moments from Historic Cambridge
hotels.description: Discover a relaxing spa haven on the fringes of historic Cambridge with a stay at the stylish Cambridge Belfry Hotel & Spa. This is the perfect place to relax and recharge in-between days exploring this storied city's exquisite architecture, picturesque college gardens and historic pubs. Uncover fabulous facilities including The Bridge Restaurant and The Lounge Bar, an inviting heated pool and a luxurious day spa boasting a sauna, steam room and blissful ELEMIS treatments. What’s more, you’re only around a 15-minute drive from Cambridge's renowned Parker's Piece - a 25-acre open common - the eponymous Cambridge University Botanical Gardens and Fitzwilliam Museum.
